TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN ELECTROMEDICS CORP <AECO> 2ND QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Qtr ends Jan 31 Shr loss three cts vs loss six cts Net loss 93,000 vs loss 191,000 Revs 338,000 vs 554,000 Six mths Shr loss four cts vs loss seven cts Net loss 108,000 vs loss 219,000 Revs 854,000 vs 1,283,000 NOTE: Company is 80 pct owned by Technodyne Inc <TND>, a subsidiary of Electro Audio Dynamics Inc <EAD>. Reuter
